author: Horace
message: Adversity has the effect of eliciting talents, which in prosperous circumstances would have lain dormant.
title: Thought of the day

author: Morris West
message: If you spend your whole life waiting for the storm, you'll never enjoy the sunshine.
title: Thought of the day

author: Franklin Roosevelt
message: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
title: Thought of the day

author: Edwin Chapin
message: Every action of our lives touches on some chord that will vibrate in eternity.
title: Thought of the day
